name: sap-successfactors

parametersIdForGet.name: parametersIdForGet
parametersIdForGet.label: Parameters: ID for Get

label: SAP SuccessFactors

getRecord.name: getRecord
getRecord.label: Get a record

nested.help: Select parameters for response. Leave empty for default response. Mutually exclusive with __Expand__ field.
nested.name: select
nested.label: Select output

nested.help: Expand related entities. Leave empty for default response. If __Select Output__ is used, this field will be ignored.
nested.name: expand
nested.label: Expand

getRecord.description: Retrieves details about specified record of selected record type.
getRecord.expectJsonc:
[
	{
		"name": "recordType",
		"type": "select",
		"label": "Record type",
		"options": "rpc://listEndpoints",
		"required": true,
		"grouped":true,
		"editable": false,
		"nested": [
			"rpc://parametersIdForGet",
			{
				"name": "select",
				"type": "select",
				"label": "Select output",
				"multiple": true,
				"options": "rpc://parametersSelectOutput",
				"help": "Select parameters for response. Leave empty for default response. Mutually exclusive with __Expand__ field."
			},
			{
				"name": "expand",
				"type": "select",
				"label": "Expand",
				"multiple": true,
				"options": "rpc://parametersExpand",
				"help": "Expand related entities. Leave empty for default response. If __Select Output__ is used, this field will be ignored."
			}
		]
	}
]

makeAnApiCall.name: makeAnApiCall
makeAnApiCall.label: Make an API call

expect.help: Enter a path relative to `https://<yourDamain>`. For example, `/odata/v2/PerPerson`.
expect.name: url
expect.label: URL

expect.help: You don't have to add authorization headers; we already did that for you.
expect.name: headers
expect.label: Headers

makeAnApiCall.description: Performs an arbitrary authorized API call.

searchRecords.name: searchRecords
searchRecords.label: Search records

nested.help: Use OData Filter string to filter the results. For more details see the [Odata Documentation](https://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.0/errata03/os/complete/part1-protocol/odata-v4.0-errata03-os-part1-protocol-complete.html#_The_$filter_System).
nested.name: odataFilter
nested.label: Filter

nested.help: Select parameters for response. Leave empty for default response. Mutually exclusive with __Expand__ field.
nested.name: select
nested.label: Select output

nested.help: Expand related entities. Leave empty for default response. If __Select Output__ is used, this field will be ignored.
nested.name: expand
nested.label: Expand

expect.help: The search is only available in fields that are configured as `searchable` in your instance.
expect.name: search
expect.label: Search

searchRecords.description: Searches for records of the selected record type.
searchRecords.expectJsonc:
[
	{
		"name": "recordType",
		"type": "select",
		"label": "Record type",
		"options": "rpc://listEndpoints",
		"required": true,
		"grouped": true,
		"nested": [
			{
				"name": "odataFilter",
				"type": "text",
				"label": "Filter",
				"help": "Use OData Filter string to filter the results. For more details see the [Odata Documentation](https://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.0/errata03/os/complete/part1-protocol/odata-v4.0-errata03-os-part1-protocol-complete.html#_The_$filter_System)."
			},
			{
				"name": "select",
				"type": "select",
				"label": "Select output",
				"multiple": true,
				"options": "rpc://parametersSelectOutput",
				"help": "Select parameters for response. Leave empty for default response. Mutually exclusive with __Expand__ field."
			},
			{
				"name": "expand",
				"type": "select",
				"label": "Expand",
				"multiple": true,
				"options": "rpc://parametersExpand",
				"help": "Expand related entities. Leave empty for default response. If __Select Output__ is used, this field will be ignored."
			},
			{
				"name": "orderby",
				"type": "select",
				"label": "Order by",
				"multiple": true,
				"options": "rpc://parametersOrderBy"
			}
		]
	},
	{
		"name": "search",
		"type": "text",
		"label": "Search",
		"advanced": true,
		"help": "The search is only available in fields that are configured as `searchable` in your instance."
	},
	{
		"name": "limit",
		"type": "uinteger",
		"label": "Limit",
		"default": 10,
		"help": "Maximum number of returned results (bundles)."
	}
]
